verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came יוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> yo-Sef Then Joseph וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> vai-yag-Ged and told לְפַרְעֹה֒ <WH6547> le-far-'Oh Pharaoh וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said אָבִ֨י <WH1> 'a-Vi My father וְאַחַ֜י <WH251> ve-'a-Chai and my brethren וְצֹאנָ֤ם <WH6629> ve-tzo-Nam and their flocks וּבְקָרָם֙ <WH1241> u-ve-ka-Ram and their herds וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u and all that they have are come out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְהִנָּ֖ם <WH2005> ve-hin-Nam are in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz and behold they [are] in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> Go-shen. of Goshen

וּמִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> u-mik-Tzeh some אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, of his brethren לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> la-Kach And he took חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah [even] five אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim; men וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם <WH3322> vai-yatz-tzi-Gem and presented לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei them unto פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> far-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> 'e-Chav unto his brethren מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם <WH4639> ma-'a-sei-Chem; act וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh רֹעֵ֥ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh are shepherds צֹאן֙ <WH6629> tzoN cattle עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha, Thy servants גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- both אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-nu. both we [and] also our fathers

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru They said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, moreover unto Pharaoh לָג֣וּר <WH1481> la-Gur For to sojourn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> ba-'a-Retz in the land בָּאנוּ֒ <WH935> ba-Nu are we come כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein there מִרְעֶ֗ה <WH4829> mir-'Eh, have no pasture לַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> latz-tzoN for their flocks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher your לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, for thy servants כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> cha-Ved [is] sore הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> ha-ra-'Av for the famine בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now יֵֽשְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> ye-she-vu- dwell נָ֥א <WH4994> na please עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha now therefore we pray thee let thy servants בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> Go-shen. of Goshen

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אָבִ֥יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha Thy father וְאַחֶ֖יךָ <WH251> ve-'a-Chei-cha and thy brethren בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u are come אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz The land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha [is] before thee הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he בְּמֵיטַ֣ב <WH4315> be-mei-Tav in the best הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land הוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> ho-Shev to dwell אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַחֶ֑יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chei-cha; and brethren יֵשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> ye-she-Vu let them dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <WH1657> Go-shen, of Goshen וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- and if יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta, know וְיֶשׁ־ <WH3426> ve-yesh- any בָּם֙ bam אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> 'an-shei- men חַ֔יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil, of activity וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם <WH7760> ve-sam-Tam among them then make them שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei rulers מִקְנֶ֖ה <WH4735> mik-Neh over my cattle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought in יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אָבִ֔יו <WH1> 'a-Viv, his father וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-mi-De-hu and set him לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> far-'Oh; Pharaoh וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko and Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> par-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; unto Jacob כַּמָּ֕ה <WH4100> kam-Mah How יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> ye-Mei age שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8141> she-Nei years חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> chai-Yei-cha. age

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> ye-Mei The days שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> she-Nei of the years מְגוּרַ֔י <WH4033> me-gu-Rai, of my pilgrimage שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> u-me-'At [are] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> me-'At few וְרָעִ֗ים <WH7451> ve-ra-'Im, and evil הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ha-Yu have been יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> ye-Mei have the days שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> she-Nei of the years חַיַּ֔י <WH2416> chai-Yai, of my life וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ <WH5381> his-Si-gu, been and have not attained אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> ye-Mei unto the days שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> she-Nei of the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> chai-Yei of the life אֲבֹתַ֔י <WH1> 'a-vo-Tai, of my fathers בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4033> me-gu-rei-Hem. of their pilgrimage

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> par-'Oh; Pharaoh וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze and went out מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei from before פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> far-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> vai-yo-Shev placed יוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָבִ֣יו <WH1> 'a-Viv his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶחָיו֒ <WH251> 'e-Chav and his brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH14> vai-yit-Ten would לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem אֲחֻזָּה֙ <WH272> 'a-chuz-Zah them a possession בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt בְּמֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> be-mei-Tav in the best הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land רַעְמְסֵ֑ס <WH7486> ra'-me-Ses; of Rameses כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> far-'Oh. as Pharaoh

וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל <WH3557> vay-chal-Kel nourished יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָבִ֣יו <WH1> 'a-Viv his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, and his brethren וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit household אָבִ֑יו <WH1> 'a-Viv; and all his father's לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem with bread לְפִ֥י <WH6310> le-Fi according הַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> hat-Taf. to [their] families

וְלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem And [there was] no bread אֵין֙ <WH369> 'ein now there בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, in all the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> cha-Ved sore הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> ha-ra-'Av for the famine מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; [was] very וַתֵּ֜לַהּ <WH3856> vat-Te-lah fainted אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz so that the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ve-'E-retz and [all] the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei by reason הָרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> ha-ra-'Av. of the famine

וַיְלַקֵּ֣ט <WH3950> vay-lak-Ket gathered up יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef all the money הַנִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> han-nim-Tza that was found בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> ve-'e-retz- in the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וּבְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> u-ve-'E-retz and in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan בַּשֶּׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> bash-She-ver for the corn אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הֵ֣ם <WH1992> hem they שֹׁבְרִ֑ים <WH7666> shoe-Rim; which they bought וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef and Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef the money בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> Bei-tah house פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> far-'Oh. into Pharaoh's

וַיִּתֹּ֣ם <WH8552> vai-yit-Tom failed הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef, And when money מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> u-me-'E-retz and in the land כְּנַעַן֒ <WH3667> ke-na-'An of Canaan וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> vai-ya-vo-'U came כָל־ <WH3605> chol all מִצְרַ֨יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> yo-Sef unto Joseph לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> le-Mor and said הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, us bread וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> ve-Lam-mah why נָמ֖וּת <WH4191> na-Mut for why should we die נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5048> neg-De-cha; about כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אָפֵ֖ס <WH656> 'a-Fes faileth כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. in thy presence;for the money

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph הָב֣וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Give מִקְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4735> mik-nei-Chem, your cattle וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> ve-'et-te-Nah and I will give לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בְּמִקְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4735> be-mik-nei-Chem; you for your cattle אִם־ <WH518> 'im- since אָפֵ֖ס <WH656> 'a-Fes fail כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. if money

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u And they brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִקְנֵיהֶם֮ <WH4735> mik-nei-Hem their cattle אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יוֹסֵף֒ <WH3130> yo-Sef unto Joseph וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten gave לָהֶם֩ la-Hem יוֹסֵ֨ף <WH3130> yo-Sef and Joseph לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem them bread בַּסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> bas-su-Sim, [in exchange] for horses וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> u-ve-mik-Neh and for the cattle הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon and for the flocks וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> u-ve-mik-Neh for all their cattle הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> hab-ba-Kar of the herds וּבַחֲמֹרִ֑ים <WH2543> u-va-cha-mo-Rim; and for the asses וַיְנַהֲלֵ֤ם <WH5095> vay-na-ha-Lem and he fed בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bal-Le-chem them with bread בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol for all מִקְנֵהֶ֔ם <WH4735> mik-ne-Hem, their livestock בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah for that year הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> ha-Hiv. he
